message.content:
1. Facial swelling was measured.
2. A tape measure was used to measure facial swelling.
3. The tape measure was placed from tragus to gonion to tragus.
4. Interincisal mouth-opening of patients was measured.
5. A vernier calibrated caliper was used to measure interincisal mouth-opening.
6. The measurements were taken pre-operatively.
7. The measurements were also taken post-operatively.

messages.content:
Statement: Facial swelling was measured using a tape measure placed from tragus to gonion to tragus, while interincisal mouth-opening of patients was measured using a vernier calibrated caliper pre-operatively and post-operatively.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
